thread.title: Device prevents car theft by protecting keys

title: Device prevents car theft by protecting keys
text:
Device prevents car theft by protecting keys 9:53pm IST - 01:36
Keyless Protector, a small device that blocks the car key's signal at the driver's command, prevents modern cars from being stolen by protecting the car key. Roselle Chen reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Keyless Protector, a small device that blocks the car key's signal at the driver's command, prevents modern cars from being stolen by protecting the car key. Roselle Chen reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Kns5Oa
